plays.text: Penalty to Richard Zednik 2 minutes for Hooking Peter Schaefer

Penalty to Patrice Brisebois 2 minutes for Crosschecking Daniel Alfredsson
Goal scored by Daniel Alfredsson assisted by Zdeno Chara and Mike Fisher
Penalty to Stephane Quintal 2 minutes for Holding Shane Hnidy
Goal scored by Shaun Van Allen assisted by Todd White and Wade Redden
